name: Penguin Survivor (GoodLlamas)
description:
Penguin Survivor is a short and addictive top-down 3D shooter. Battle your way through waves of zombie penguins and shoot them with your infinite snowballs. Try and get as high of a score as possible, out your personal best in the comments!

 This game was developed entirely by myself and was created in a few days for fun. I developed the game in unity using MagicaVoxel for the modeling.

Controls:

           WASD for movement, right click for shooting
